page.title: 09MILTON SCHOOL NEWS.
page.content: To widen their education,Milton pupils exchange tapes,letters and photos with their Commonwealth Link School at Darlington,Beaudesert,Queensland.In May,outings and competitions made news.Milton beat{Star}and{Coaltown } Schools at chess,but lost the football at Coaltown.Mrs Walker's class drove to{Vane Farm Nature Reserve,Kinross}to study wild flowers on Vane Hill and by the shore of the Loch.Mrs Winn's class went to{East Wemyss Environmental {Centre}to explore the sea shore.Five children planted flowers in their garden at{Letham Glen Nature Centre, {Leven.}In the Royal Commonwealth Society Essay Competition, Robert Henderson won a certificate for his essay on wildlife.His twin David won in the Scottish section.Mrs Walker and the boys went to{St Cecilia's Hall {Edinburgh}for the presentation.
